h1_title: How to Open the Purple Seal Prison Doors in the Pagoda Realm
h2_title: How to Remove the Purple Magic Seals on the Prison Cells in Chapter 3
content: Return to the Lower Pagoda Keeper's Shrine, and you can now make your way back to the prison cell that you first saw with the purple magic seal on it. Speak to the NPC inside, and collect the sword from the dead two-headed rat. This will reward you with the**Ashen Slumber spell.**
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'How_to_Open_the_Purple_Seal_Prison_Doors_in_the_Pagoda_Realm.md', within the main section titled 'How to Open the Purple Seal Prison Doors in the Pagoda Realm', specifically from the subsection 'How to Remove the Purple Magic Seals on the Prison Cells in Chapter 3'.
The content is as follows:
Return to the Lower Pagoda Keeper's Shrine, and you can now make your way back to the prison cell that you first saw with the purple magic seal on it. Speak to the NPC inside, and collect the sword from the dead two-headed rat. This will reward you with the**Ashen Slumber spell.**
